title: 请论坛提供新的图床
author: siiftun1857
txt_content:
本帖最后由 siiftun1857 于 2015-10-16 22:47 编辑 

http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 6&page=2#pid9222152
8个小时前接到邮件后结果死活无法上传图片
最终第二次新闻被抢。。。。。。(第一次是Minecon门票售光)
(百度万恶的希望厨房)

求论坛寻找新图床，方便iOS用户上传图片。
(没图片的新闻谁看啊！。。。。。)JIRA to siiftun1857
[JIRA] (MC-2781) Chinese, Japanese and Korean (and probably other IME entered languages) characters not working
2015年10月6日 下午2:54
        [Mojang] Grum (Erik Broes) resolved an issue as Fixed

Tried implementing the above-mentioned fix. Though that path was never reached when getEventKeyState() returned false, does now with some extra changes.
Please check it in the next snapshot 
Minecraft /  MC-2781
Chinese, Japanese and Korean (and probably other IME entered languages) characters not working
Change By:        [Mojang] Grum (Erik Broes)
Resolution:        Fixed
Fix Version/s:        Future Version - 1.9+
Status:        Reopened ResolvedJIRA to siiftun1857
[JIRA] (MC-2781) Chinese, Japanese and Korean (and probably other IME entered languages) characters not working
2015年10月6日 下午7:35
        Lauris commented on an issue

Re: Chinese, Japanese and Korean (and probably other IME entered languages) characters not working
Thank you Grum! I always were very frustrated that I can't type Japanese directly into Minecraft. You made my day, can't wait for next snapshot ^^
         Add Comment

Minecraft /  MC-2781
Chinese, Japanese and Korean (and probably other IME entered languages) characters not working
Hi, Since Minecraft 1.1, Chinese Player cannot type chinese word in minecraft chatting.. in minecraft 1.4.2 the bug is still not fix.. I hope it can be fix soon in next version Thanks

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content: 我也是ios的，贴图库根本不能上传……

replies.author: siiftun1857
replies.txt_content:
lzs1234 发表于 2015-10-16 22:37
我也是ios的，贴图库根本不能上传……
表示收到邮件的时候iPad翁的一声响了起来
8个小时之后看到了新闻
(说好的3次新闻给新闻官勋章结果就这么没了)
